name: Dr. Lisa Chen
core_wound: Made a mistake early in career that let a killer go free - now triple-checks everything
wants: To provide definitive answers through science
needs: To accept that not everything can be proven in a lab
voice_markers: Explains technical concepts with everyday metaphors
contradiction: Wants certainty but works in a field of probabilities

relationships.Dr_Harrington: Knows her by reputation, admires her cardiac work
relationships.Captain_Walsh: Frustration - he wants answers faster than science provides

background: 52-year-old medical examiner, state forensics lab. 25 years experience. Known for meticulous work and refusing to be pressured into premature conclusions.
